messages.message:
In Converse, I notice an improper message scope count:
• I originally had 1 pdf
• Then, I added a CSV file
• I ran one query
• I deleted the CSV file
• I cleared the chat
• I added an updated version of the same CSV file (so, same name)
~Removing the files from scope and adding them again corrected the count, but I figure it may be helpful to share here so folks are aware of a potential edge case~

Update: I somehow was able to get the 3 to pop up again, so it looks like this issue does persist (see screenshot in next message)
